!Trader Arodin: You must recover the cargo stolen by *Turek orcs*. The cargo consists of *20 sword Blade Molds*. When you have recovered all of them, take them to *Dark Elven Trader Tyra*. You will find her in her store in the western part of the Altar of Rites. Have you heard the rumor? [Quest _171_ActsOfEvil 30207-02.htm|"Tell me about the rumor."]
